            if (data.msgID !== 0) {

            }
        };

        window._sp_.config.mms_choice_selected_callback = function (choiceID) {
            if (choiceID === 1) {
                ck.tracking.trackEvent(JSON.parse('{"type":"event", "name":"sourcepoint", "action":"adblocker-deactivated"}'));
            } else if (choiceID === 3) {
                ck.tracking.trackEvent(JSON.parse('{"type":"event", "name":"sourcepoint", "action":"video-played"}'));
            }
        };

<script type="text/javascript">
    var unsetFeatureFunction = false;

    if (typeof feature === 'undefined') {
        function feature(name) {
            var value = document.cookie.replace(/(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)CK_FEATURE_FLAG\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/, '$1');
            if(!value) return false;
            value = decodeURIComponent(value);
            var features = value.split('|');

            return -1 === features.indexOf(name) ? false : true;
        }

        unsetFeatureFunction = true;
    }

    var forceGujAd = feature('FEATURE_FLAG_FORCE_GUJAD');

    if (forceGujAd || (!(CK.core.hasSmallViewport() && CK.core.isLocationResponsive()))) {

        var GujAd = GujAd || {};
        var gujadLinkJS = "https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/gujAd.min.js";
        var siteType = CK.core.hasSmallViewport() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';

        GujAd.cmd = GujAd.cmd || [];

                if (window.location.search.indexOf('gujAd=1') > -1) {
            gujadLinkJS = "https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/gujAd.js";
        }

        GujAd.cmd.push(function () {
            GujAd.getClient().setSiteType(siteType);
            GujAd.getClient().setZone('rezepte');
                        GujAd.getClient().addKeywords(['Pasta','Salzwasser','Lachsfilets','Sahne','Weißwein','Zwiebeln','Knoblauchzehen','Tomatenmark','Salz und Pfeffer','Zucker','Zitronensaft','Tomaten','Wasser','Fisch','gekocht','Gemüse','Hauptspeise','Nudeln','2873431439629839','simpel','rezepte']);
                    });
            }

    if (typeof adkwds == "undefined") { adkwds = ';kw=Pasta;kw=Salzwasser;kw=Lachsfilets;kw=Sahne;kw=Weißwein;kw=Zwiebeln;kw=Knoblauchzehen;kw=Tomatenmark;kw=Salz und Pfeffer;kw=Zucker;kw=Zitronensaft;kw=Tomaten;kw=Wasser;kw=Fisch;kw=gekocht;kw=Gemüse;kw=Hauptspeise;kw=Nudeln;kw=2873431439629839;kw=simpel;kw=rezepte'; }

    if (unsetFeatureFunction) {
        window.feature = undefined;
    }
</script>

        m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)

    this.ck=this.ck||{},this.ck.tracking=function(){"use strict";function r(r){if(Array.isArray(r)){for(var t=0,n=Array(r.length);t<r.length;t++)n[t]=r[t];return n}return Array.from(r)}function t(){var t=[],n=null,i=function(r,i){n?n[r](i):t.push([r,i])};this.trackImpression=function(r){i("trackImpression",r)},this.trackTeaser=function(r){i("trackTeaser",r)},this.trackEvent=function(r){i("trackEvent",r)},this.setTrackingService=function(c){n=c,t.forEach(function(t){return i.apply(void 0,r(t))})}}return new t}();

<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "http://schema.org",
  "@type": "Recipe",
  "cookTime": "PT15M",
  "prepTime": "PT15M",
  "datePublished": "2015-08-18",
  "description": "Pasta mit Lachs-Sahnesauce, ein tolles Rezept mit Bild aus der Kategorie Gemüse. 51 Bewertungen: &amp;Oslash; 4,6. Tags: Fisch, gekocht, Gemüse, Hauptspeise, Nudeln, Pasta",
    "image": "https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/rezepte/287/287343/1024311-960x720-pasta-mit-lachs-sahnesauce.jpg",
    "recipeIngredient": [
                  "500,00 g Pasta nach Wahl",                        "  Salzwasser ",                        "400,00 g Lachsfilet(s) , am besten frisch",                        "300,00 ml Sahne ",                        "100,00 ml Weißwein ",                        "1,00 m.-große Zwiebel(n) ",                        "1,00  Knoblauchzehe(n) ",                        "2,00 EL Tomatenmark ",                        "  Salz und Pfeffer ",                        "1,00 EL Zucker ",                        "  Zitronensaft ",                        "2,00  Tomate(n) ",                        " etwas Wasser , evtl."            ],
  "name": "Pasta mit Lachs-Sahnesauce",
  "author": {
    "@type": "Person",
    "name": "stroffel"
  },
    "recipeInstructions": "Die Zwiebel fein w\u00fcrfeln und in einem Topf mit Oliven\u00f6l bei mittlerer Hitze glasig anschwitzen. Den Knoblauch dazupressen und etwa 30 Sekunden mitgaren. Mit Wei\u00dfwein abl\u00f6schen. \n\nDas Tomatenmark einr\u00fchren und etwa 5 Minuten schwach k\u00f6cheln lassen. Bei Bedarf einen kleinen Schuss Wasser dazugeben. Mit der Sahne aufgie\u00dfen und noch mal aufkochen lassen. Mit Salz, Pfeffer, Zucker und Zitronensaft abschmecken. Den Topf vom Herd nehmen. \n\nDen Lachs waschen und ggf. entgr\u00e4ten und h\u00e4uten. In 1 cm gro\u00dfe W\u00fcrfel schneiden und in die Sauce geben. Der Lachs gart nun in der Restw\u00e4rme der Sauce, bitte den Deckel auf den Topf legen!\n\nW\u00e4hrenddessen Salzwasser aufstellen und die Nudeln bissfest kochen. Wenn die Nudeln fertig sind, die Sauce nochmals aufkochen. Die Tomaten klein w\u00fcrfeln und zur Sauce geben, 1 Minute ziehen lassen. Man kann die Nudeln gleich zur Sauce geben und vermischen oder separat servieren.\n\nTipp: Ein kleiner gr\u00fcner Salat rundet das Gericht ab.",
  "recipeYield": "4"
  ,
  "aggregateRating": {
    "@type": "AggregateRating",
    "ratingValue": "4.60",

    "worstRating": 0,
    "bestRating": 5
  }
    ,

              "Fisch",              "gekocht",              "Gemüse",              "Hauptspeise",              "Nudeln",              "Pasta"          ]
  }
</script>

<div id="page" class="recipe-view" ng-app="chefkoch.recipe">
    <div ng-controller="RecipeDetailCtrl">

        <script type="text/ng-template" id="saveRecipeModal.html">
	<div id="saveOverlay" class="" ng-class="{ 'has-no-step': groupCookbooks.length < 1}" dynamic-height-dialog>
		<div class="modal-header">
			<a href="" class="close" ng-click="cancel()" aria-hidden="true"></a>
			<h3 title="{{ recipeTitle.full }}"><span ng-bind="recipeTitle.short"></span> ins Kochbuch speichern</h3>
		</div>
		<div class="modal-body">
			<div class="cookbook-select m-t-s" ng-if="groupCookbooks.length > 0">
				<h3 class="no-m-t">
					<span class="step-number">
						1
					</span>
					Kochbuch auswählen

				</h3>
				<div class="step-container">

					<div class="a-c">

						<div class="ck-radio-container m-b">

							<div class="ck-radio-button is-active"
								 title="Öffentliche Rezeptsammlung"
								 role="radio"
								 ng-click="selectPrivateCookbook()"
								 ng-class="{ 'is-active': !groupCookbookView }"
								>

								Kochbuch
							</div>
							<div class="ck-radio-button"
								 title="Private Rezeptsammlung"
								 role="radio"
								 ng-click="selectGroupCookbooks()"
								 ng-class="{ 'is-active': groupCookbookView }"
								>
								Gruppen-Kochbücher
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="group-cookbooks p-t"
				 ng-class="{ 'is-hidden': !groupCookbookView }"
				>
				<h3 class="m-b-s">
					<span class="step-number">2</span>
					Gruppe auswählen
				</h3>
				<div class="step-container">
					<div class="alert alert-info m-b">
						<strong>Hinweis:</strong> Hier werden nur Gruppen angezeigt, in deren Kochbuch Sie speichern dürfen
					</div>
					<select class="" ng-model="form.cookbook" ng-change="selectCookbook(form.cookbook)" ng-options="c.name || c.group.name for c in groupCookbooks" >
						<option value="" selected>Gruppe ausw&auml;hlen</option>
					</select>
				</div>
			</div>


			<div class="p-t" ng-hide="groupCookbookView && collections.all.length < 1">
				<h3>
					<span ng-hide="groupCookbooks.length < 1" class="step-number" ng-bind="activeCookbook == privateCookbook ? collectionStepNumber : collectionStepNumber + 1"></span>
					<span ng-hide="createMode">Sammlung (Kategorie) ausw&auml;hlen <span ng-show="collections.all.length > 1" style="font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal">(Mehrfachauswahl m&ouml;glich)</span></span>
					<span ng-hide="!createMode">Neue Sammlung anlegen</span>
				</h3>

				<div class="mode-container p-b" ng-class="{ 'is-mode-select': !createMode, 'is-mode-create': createMode }">
					<div class="step-container m-b">
						<div ng-show="recipeIsContained && !createMode && 'success' != recipeSaveStatus" class="alert alert-info">
							<strong>Hinweis:</strong> Dieses Rezept ist bereits in Ihrem Kochbuch enthalten.
						</div>

						<div ng-show="'success' == recipeSaveStatus && !createMode" class="alert alert-success">
							Das Rezept wurde erfolgreich im Kochbuch gespeichert. Sie können es noch in eine Sammlung legen.
						</div>

						<div ng-show="'error' == recipeSaveStatus" class="alert alert-error">
							Es tut uns leid. Da ist ein unerwarteter Fehler aufgetreten.
						</div>

						<div ng-show="'error-limit' == recipeSaveStatus" class="alert alert-error">
							Die gewählte Sammlung ist bereits voll. Bitte leg eine weitere Sammlung an.
						</div>
					</div>

					<div class="recipe-save-mode mode-collection-select" ng-class="{ 'is-active': !createMode }">
						<div class="collection-selector step-container">
							<div class="a-c loading p" ng-show="loadingCollections">
								<img src="/img/loader/spinner-01-green-white.gif" alt="Daten werden geladen..."/>
							</div>
							<div class="box-toolbar clearfix" ng-hide="loadingCollections">
								<div class="f-r filter-container">
									<i class="ck-icon-search filter-icon search"></i>
									<input ng-model="collectionFilter.category.name"  class="filter input-w-200" placeholder="Nach einer Sammlung suchen" type="text"/>
									<a title="Auswahl aufheben" href="" class="filter-icon clear"
									   ng-click="resetFilter()"
									   ng-show="collectionFilter.category.name.length > 0">
										<i class="ck-icon-cancel-circle"></i>
									</a>
								</div>
							</div>
							<ul class="item-list" ng-hide="loadingCollections">
								<li ng-repeat="collectionWrapper in collections.all | filter: collectionFilter"
									ng-class="{ 'is-checked': contains(selectedCollections, collectionWrapper), 'is-disabled': collectionWrapper.isFull, 'is-contained': collectionWrapper.containsRecipe }"
									class="item-list-item item"
									ng-click="selectCollection(collectionWrapper)"	>

									<div class="is-selectable with-selector clearfix">

										<span class="selector wo-overlay">
											<button type="button"
													class="ck-checkbox"
													role="checkbox"
													ng-hide="collectionWrapper.containsRecipe || collectionWrapper.isFull === true"
													ng-class="{ 'is-checked': contains(selectedCollections, collectionWrapper) }"></button>
										</span>
										<span class="selectable item-content">
											<span class="count f-r" ng-bind="collectionWrapper.category.recipeCount"></span>
											<span class="category-name item-title" ng-bind="collectionWrapper.category.name"></span>
											<span class="category-description item-meta" ng-bind="collectionWrapper.category.descriptionText" ng-if="!collectionWrapper.isFull && !collectionWrapper.containsRecipe"></span>
											<span ng-hide="!collectionWrapper.containsRecipe">Rezept bereits enthalten</span>
											<span ng-if="collectionWrapper.isFull && !collectionWrapper.containsRecipe">Diese Sammlung hat ihr Gr&ouml;&szlig;enlimit erreicht</span>
										</span>
									</div>

								</li>
							</ul>
							<div class="p" ng-show="(allCollections | filter: collectionFilter).length < 1">
								Keine Treffer
							</div>
						</div> <!-- /.category-selector -->
						<div class="a-c m-t" ng-show="collections.all.length < maxCollections">
							oder <div class="button-gray size-100" ng-click="toggleCreateMode()">in eine neue Sammlung speichern</div>
						</div>
						<div class="a-c m-t" ng-show="collections.all.length >= maxCollections">
							oder <div class="button-disabled size-100" title="Sie haben bereits die maximale Anzahl von {{maxCollections}} Rezeptsammlungen angelegt.">eine neue Sammlung anlegen</div>
						</div>
					</div> <!-- .mode-category-select -->
					<div class="mode-collection-create recipe-save-mode" ng-class="{ 'is-active': createMode }">
						<div class="step-container">
							<form name="newCollectionForm" id="newCollectionForm" class="form-inline">
								<div class="ctrl-group">
									<label class="ctrl-label" for="categoryName"><strong>Name</strong></label>
									<div class="ctrl">
										<input id="categoryName" class="input-200" type="text" placeholder="Geben Sie hier den Name der Sammlung an" required
											   ng-model="newCollection.name"
											   ng-focus="$parent.createMode && newCollectionForm.$pristine == true"
											/>
									</div>
								</div>
								<div class="ctrl-group">
									<label class="ctrl-label" for="categoryDesc"><strong>Beschreibung</strong></label>
									<div class="ctrl">
										<input id="categoryDesc" class="input-200" type="text" placeholder="(Optional)" ng-model="newCollection.description" />
									</div>
								</div>
							</form>
						</div>
					</div> <!-- .mode-category-create -->
				</div> <!-- .mode-container -->
			</div> <!-- .p-t -->

			<div class="step-container m-t" ng-class="{ 'is-hidden': showNoteStep === true || activeCookbook === null }">
				<a ng-click="showNoteStep = true" class="m-l m-t icon-label" href=""><i class="icon green-icon-edit m-r-s"></i><strong>Notiz zum Rezept hinzufügen</strong> (optional)</a>
			</div>
			<div ng-class="{ 'is-hidden': showNoteStep !== true }">
				<div class="step-container">
					<h3>
						Notiz zum Rezept <span ng-if="form.recipeNoteText === ''">hinzuf&uuml;gen</span> <span ng-if="form.recipeNoteText !== ''">bearbeiten</span> <span class="thin">(optional)</span>
					</h3>
					<p class="alert alert-info">
						<strong>Hinweis:</strong> Die Rezeptnotiz ist nur für Sie in Ihrem Kochbuch sichtbar.
					</p>
					<form name="recipeNoteForm" class="form-inline">
						<div class="ctrl-group">
							<label class="ctrl-label" for="recipeNote"><strong>Rezeptnotiz</strong></label>
							<div class="ctrl">
								<input type="text" class="input-200" ng-model="form.recipeNoteText" ng-disabled="loadingCollections" placeholder="(Optional)"/>
							</div>
						</div>
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div> <!-- /.modal-body -->

		<div class="modal-footer">
			<span class="collection-counter fl" ng-hide="createMode">
				<span>{{ selectedCollections.length }} ausgew&auml;hlte Sammlung<span ng-show="selectedCollections.length !== 1">en</span></span>
			</span>
			<button ng-if="(!createMode && selectedCollections.length > 0) || createMode"
							ng-disabled="(createMode && !newCollectionForm.$valid)"
							ng-click="saveRecipe()"
							class="button-green">Fertig</button>
			<button ng-if="!createMode && selectedCollections.length == 0"
                            class="button-green"
                            ng-click="cancel()">Fertig</button>
		</div>

	</div>
</script>

<script type="text/ng-template" id="saveFeedback.html">
	<div class="modal-header">
		<h3>{{ title }}</h3>
	</div>
	<div class="modal-body">
		{{ feedbackText }}
	</div>
	<div class="modal-footer">
		<button class="button button-green" ng-click="$close()">{{ buttonText }}</button>
	</div>
</script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
        function AmobeeAdHeader()
        {
            getAmobeeAd(
                document.getElementById('AmobeeAd'),
                '25900', // AdSpace ID (String)
                '', // leer (String)
                1, // Timeout in Sekunden (Integer)
                0, // 1 fuer Test Requests (Integer)
                '', // Ziel-URL (String) - leer fuer mobile Banner,
                'tp=4&prt=G+J&kw=Pasta,Salzwasser,Lachsfilets,Sahne,Weißwein,Zwiebeln,Knoblauchzehen,Tomatenmark,Salz und Pfeffer,Zucker,Zitronensaft,Tomaten,Wasser,Fisch,gekocht,Gemüse,Hauptspeise,Nudeln,2873431439629839,simpel;kw=rezepte&uid=' + window.CK.ems.handleEmsUId() // Targeting-Werte als HTML Parameter (String),
            );
        }
        </script>

        <div class="alert alert-info js-random-recipe__cta-container is-hidden"><button class="close" data-dismiss="alert">x</button>Ein <a href="/rezepte/zufallsrezept/?t=1543349274"><strong>weiteres Zufallsrezept</strong></a></div>

        
        <div class="js-search-result-sibling-navigator search-result-sibling-navigator clearfix">
    <a class="js-search-result-sibling-navigator__previous search-result-sibling-navigator__button f-l">
        <svg class="search-result-sibling-navigator__icon m-r" viewBox="0 0 8 8">
            <path d="M4 0l-4 4 4 4v-8z" transform="translate(2)" fill="currentColor"></path>
        </svg>voriges Rezept</a>
    <a class="js-search-result-sibling-navigator__back-to-search search-result-sibling-navigator__back-to-search" >zur Ergebnisliste</a>
    <a class="js-search-result-sibling-navigator__next search-result-sibling-navigator__button f-r">nächstes Rezept<svg class="search-result-sibling-navigator__icon m-l" viewBox="0 0 8 8">
            <path d="M0 0v8l4-4-4-4z" transform="translate(2)" fill="currentColor"></path>
        </svg>
    </a>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function searchResultSiblingNavigator() {

        
        var options = {
            selectors: {
                container: ".js-search-result-sibling-navigator",
                prevLink: ".js-search-result-sibling-navigator__previous",
                nextLink: ".js-search-result-sibling-navigator__next",
                backToSearch: ".js-search-result-sibling-navigator__back-to-search"
            }
        };

        var container = document.querySelector(options.selectors.container);
        var prevLink = document.querySelector(options.selectors.prevLink);
        var nextLink = document.querySelector(options.selectors.nextLink);
        var backToSearch = document.querySelector(options.selectors.backToSearch);

        var recipeBrowsingData;

        // Feature detect + local reference
        var storage;
        var fail;
        var uid;
        try {
            uid = new Date;
            (storage = window.localStorage).setItem(uid, uid);
            fail = storage.getItem(uid) != uid;
            storage.removeItem(uid);
            fail && (storage = false);
        } catch (exception) {}

        if (storage) {
            if (storage.recipeBrowsingData) {
                recipeBrowsingData = JSON.parse(storage.recipeBrowsingData);
            }
            if (!recipeBrowsingData || recipeBrowsingData.results.length === 1) {
                return;
            }

            var index = 0;
            var url = document.location.toString();

            recipeBrowsingData.results.forEach(function(result) {
                if (url.indexOf(result.url) >= 0) {
                    var previousResult = recipeBrowsingData.results[index - 1];
                    if (previousResult) {
                        // add prev url
                        prevLink.setAttribute("href", previousResult.url);

                        // show prev item
                        if (prevLink.classList)
                            prevLink.classList.add('is-enabled');
                        else
                            prevLink.className += ' is-enabled';
                    }

                    var nextResult = recipeBrowsingData.results[index + 1];
                    if (nextResult) {
                        // add next url
                        nextLink.setAttribute('href', nextResult.url);

                        // show next item
                        if (nextLink.classList)
                            nextLink.classList.add('is-enabled');
                        else
                            nextLink.className += ' is-enabled';
                    }

                    // add searchUrl to back link
                    var searchUrl = recipeBrowsingData.searchHost
                        + recipeBrowsingData.searchPath
                        + (recipeBrowsingData.searchHash ? recipeBrowsingData.searchHash : '');

                    backToSearch.setAttribute('href', searchUrl);

                    // show search result sibling navigation container
                    container.style.display = 'block';
                }

                index++;
            });
        }
    })();
</script>

                    </figure>
                                    <figure class="recipe-image">
                        <a href="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/rezepte/287/287343/977792-960x720-pasta-mit-lachs-sahnesauce.jpg" id="6" target="_blank" class="slideshow-imagelink">
                            <img
                                class="slideshow-image lazyload"
                                data-expand="300"
                                src="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/rezepte/287/287343/977792-420x280-fix-pasta-mit-lachs-sahnesauce.jpg"
                                srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="
                                data-srcset="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/rezepte/287/287343/977792-420x280-fix-pasta-mit-lachs-sahnesauce.jpg 420w"
                                sizes="(min-width: 600px) 420px,
                                        100vw - 20px"
                                alt="Pasta mit Lachs-Sahnesauce 6"

                                data-image-group="977792"
                                data-voting='{"average":3.6,"count":5,"css_class":"rating-3_5"}' />
                        </a>
                        <figcaption class="recipe-image__caption">
                            <div class="recipe-image__count image-count recipe-image__caption-item">

</div>

            </div>
                                        <div class="mobile-link-list-container mobile-only">
                    <h2 class="h2-medium">Weitere Rezepte – genauso gut!</h2>
                    <ul class="link-list">

            </a></li>

                </svg>
            </a></li>

                </svg>
            </a></li>
            <li><a class="link-list__item" href="/rezepte/1342861239100533/Tortellini-alla-panna.html">Tortellini alla panna                <svg class="link-list__item__icon" fill="#" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 8 8">

                </svg>
            </a></li>
    </ul>                </div>
            
            <h2 class="h2-medium">Zubereitung</h2>

            <p id="preparation-info">
                <strong>Arbeitszeit:</strong>
                ca. 15 Min.
                
                    / <strong>Koch-/Backzeit:</strong>
                    ca. 15 Min.
                
                
                / <strong>Schwierigkeitsgrad:</strong>

                simpel
                / <strong>Kalorien p. P.:</strong>

                
                    keine Angabe

                            </p>

                        <div id="rezept-zubereitung" class="instructions m-b-200">

                Die Zwiebel fein würfeln und in einem Topf mit Olivenöl bei mittlerer Hitze glasig anschwitzen. Den Knoblauch dazupressen und etwa 30 Sekunden mitgaren. Mit Weißwein ablöschen. <br />
<br />
Das Tomatenmark einrühren und etwa 5 Minuten schwach köcheln lassen. Bei Bedarf einen kleinen Schuss Wasser dazugeben. Mit der Sahne aufgießen und noch mal aufkochen lassen. Mit Salz, Pfeffer, Zucker und Zitronensaft abschmecken. Den Topf vom Herd nehmen. <br />
<br />
Den Lachs waschen und ggf. entgräten und häuten. In 1 cm große Würfel schneiden und in die Sauce geben. Der Lachs gart nun in der Restwärme der Sauce, bitte den Deckel auf den Topf legen!<br />
<br />
Währenddessen Salzwasser aufstellen und die Nudeln bissfest kochen. Wenn die Nudeln fertig sind, die Sauce nochmals aufkochen. Die Tomaten klein würfeln und zur Sauce geben, 1 Minute ziehen lassen. Man kann die Nudeln gleich zur Sauce geben und vermischen oder separat servieren.<br />
<br />
Tipp: Ein kleiner grüner Salat rundet das Gericht ab.
            </div>
                                                        <div class="gujAd" id="inflow_div"></div>            
            <span id="text-ads-unter-zubereitung">
                                
            <!-- de.mweb.rezept.show:below_directions -->
            <div id="s24widgetPlaceholder"></div>
            <div class="responsive-ad"><div id="AmobeeAd3Placeholder"></div></div>

                function showTextAdsMitte() {

                    showTextAdsMitte();
                } else {
                    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', showTextAdsMitte);
                }
            })();

            (function() {
                function showAdsense() {

                        <div class="comment-text" id="kommentar_1806592" itemprop="comment">Da ich vergessen hatte Weisswein zu kaufen, hab ich das Rezept mit Ouzo gemacht. Es war soooooo soooo lecker! köstlich.... Vielen Dank für das tolle, und vor allem einfache Rezepte! Davon sollte es mehr geben.</div>

                    Kommentar hilfreich?
                </div>

            </div>

            
        
                        
            <a name="k1916661"></a>
            <div itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment" id="kommentar_box_1916661" class="content-box nomargin comment">
                <div class="content-box-gradient clearfix">

                    
                    <div class="comment-author">

                        <a href="/user/profil/dd3a9cf4ff161bfe03c848102fa14668/Herdquaeler.html"><img data-src="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/avatar/dd3a9cf4ff161bfe03c848102fa14668-60fix.jpg" class="lazyload comment-author-image" alt=""></a><br/>

                        <p>19.05.2016 14:20 Uhr</p>

                    </div>
                    <div class="comment-content">

                        
                        
                        <div class="comment-text" id="kommentar_1916661" itemprop="comment">Hallo stroffel!

            <div itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment" id="kommentar_box_1926001" class="content-box nomargin comment">
                <div class="content-box-gradient clearfix">

                    
                    <div class="comment-author">

                        <a href="/user/profil/ae5c77a09aa20dbebfde159fc16c7e47/laurinili.html"><img data-src="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/avatar/ae5c77a09aa20dbebfde159fc16c7e47-60fix.jpg" class="lazyload comment-author-image" alt=""></a><br/>

                        <p>02.06.2016 16:33 Uhr</p>

                    </div>
                    <div class="comment-content">

                        
                        
                        <div class="comment-text" id="kommentar_1926001" itemprop="comment">Hallo,
<br>
<br>wie lange sollte der Lachs in der Soße ziehen, insbesondere wenn man TK Lachs verwendet?
<br>Danke für eine Antwort.
<br>
<br>LG Laurinili</div>

            <a name="k2420168"></a>
            <div itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment" id="kommentar_box_2420168" class="content-box nomargin comment">
                <div class="content-box-gradient clearfix">

                    
                    <div class="comment-author">

                        <a href="/user/profil/00685493124ac75e801860836f94d86c/doc55.html"><img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/img/default/user/buddy-60fix.jpg" class="lazyload comment-author-image" alt=""></a><br/>
<a href="/user/profil/00685493124ac75e801860836f94d86c/doc55.html">doc55</a><a href="/userrank.php" class="usericon-level1" title="Tellerw&auml;scher"></a>

                        <p>31.07.2018 16:44 Uhr</p>

                    </div>
                    <div class="comment-content">

                        
                        
                        <div class="comment-text" id="kommentar_2420168" itemprop="comment">Ich habe dieses Rezept jetzt schon zwei mal gekocht. Beim ersten genau nach Rezept, da war der Lachs sehr trocken, beim zweiten Mal habe ich den Lachs beim letzten Aufkochen dazu gegeben, da war er schön saftig wie es sein soll.
<br>Das Rezept gehört jetzt zu unseren Favotiten, der Geschmack ist toll.</div>

                    </div>
                </div>

            </div>

            <a name="k2466361"></a>
            <div itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment" id="kommentar_box_2466361" class="content-box nomargin comment">
                <div class="content-box-gradient clearfix">

                    
                    <div class="comment-author">

                        <a href="/user/profil/589de4575d160bd1c56accb652ed8b61/henrike1974.html"><img data-src="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/avatar/589de4575d160bd1c56accb652ed8b61-60fix.jpg" class="lazyload comment-author-image" alt=""></a><br/>
<a href="/user/profil/589de4575d160bd1c56accb652ed8b61/henrike1974.html">henrike1974</a><a href="/userrank.php" class="usericon-level2" title="Kartoffelsch&auml;ler"></a>

                        <p>25.10.2018 13:29 Uhr</p>

                    </div>
                    <div class="comment-content">

                        
                        
                        <div class="comment-text" id="kommentar_2466361" itemprop="comment">Ein tolles, schnelles und unkompliziertes Rezept! Das hat es bei uns nun schon mehrmals gegeben. Wenn man keine frischen Tomaten hat, kann man sich auch mit Dosentomaten behelfen, die gebe ich dann zur Sauce, wenn der Wein verkocht ist und lasse das Ganze dann mit der Sahne etwas durchkochen. 
<br>
<br>Für den unwahrscheinlichen Fall, dass es Reste gibt: die kann man prima im Ofen mit Mozzarella überbacken, wir haben ein paar Scheiben Tomaten über die Nudeln und den Lachs gegeben und das dann mit Mozzarella überbacken.</div>

                    </div>
                </div>

            </div>

            <div class="comment-actions clearfix">

        <div id="letzte-sfs-anleitung" class="content-box">
            <div class="content-box-gradient">
                <h2 class="content-box-headline standalone">
                    Schritt-f&uuml;r-Schritt Anleitungen
                </h2>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="integrated-content recipe-guides-overview-nav clearfix">
                            <div class="recipe-guide-box active first" data-recipe-guide-url="/community/anleitung/Pasta-mit-Lachs-Sahnesauce_16116">
                                            <img class="tile-article-entry-image"
                             src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/79_mJG2YNvBPZP3cPTudXpxk_wQ=/144x105/smart/ff27fc4ed131423f8e1c6823a9bbb1dd/image.jpg"

        </a>

        <div class="user-meta">
            <div class="section-headline">Anleitung von</div>
            <div class="username">
                <a href="https://www.chefkoch.de/user/profil/cd741c4005eba31ee47a136d68fafac8/kleinemama3.html">kleinemama3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>


                    <span class="spinner-overlay" style="display: none">
                        <img src="/community/bundles/chefkochfrontend/img/loader/spinner-00-green-white.gif?version=35d0828e2ac5ab9bc1a871f4994576172e37fd23" />
                    </span>
                </div>
            
            <form method="post" class="create-recipe-guide-form csrf-create-recipe-guide-form" action="/community/entries/schritt-fuer-schritt/2873431439629839/create">
                <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        var tokenAdded = false;
        $('.csrf-create-recipe-guide-form').submit(function(event) {
            if (!tokenAdded) {
                var form = $(this);
                event.preventDefault();
                $.getJSON('/community/csrf/tokens', function (tokens) {
                    form.append('<input type="hidden" name="_csrfToken" value="' + tokens.create + '" />');
                    tokenAdded = true;
                    form.submit();
                });
            }
        });
    });
</script>                <button type="submit">
                    <div>
                        neue Anleitung erstellen
                    </div>
                    <img src="/community/bundles/chefkochapp/images/icons/button-plus-round-l.png?version=35d0828e2ac5ab9bc1a871f4994576172e37fd23"
                         alt="Jetzt eine neue Schritt-f&uuml;r-Schritt-Anleitung erstellen" />
                </button>
            </form>

        </div>


                
                        
        <div id="active-recipe-guide" class="theme-community user-article content-container cf integrated-content">
                <div class="blog-entry">

        <div class="user-article-content">

                    

            <h3 class="no-m">Pasta mit Lachs-Sahnesauce</h3>
            <p class="text-s">
                erstellt von <a class="subtle" href="https://www.chefkoch.de/user/profil/cd741c4005eba31ee47a136d68fafac8/kleinemama3.html"><strong>kleinemama3</strong></a> am 19.05.2016
            </p>

                                            <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69587">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 1</div>
        <div class="step-label">Die Zutaten laut Rezept...</div>
    </h4>

                            
    
    <ul><li>500g Pasta nach Wahl</li>
	<li>Salzwasser</li>
	<li>400g Lachsfilet, am besten frisch</li>
	<li>300ml Sahne</li>
	<li>100ml Weißwein</li>
	<li>1 mittelgroße Zwiebel</li>
	<li>1 Knoblauchzehe</li>
	<li>2 EL Tomatenmark</li>
	<li>Salz</li>
	<li>Pfeffer</li>
	<li>1EL Zucker</li>
	<li>Zitronensaft</li>
	<li>2 Tomaten</li>
	<li>evtl. etwas Wasser</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69589">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 2</div>
        <div class="step-label">Zutaten vorbereiten...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                gallery-type-3-col-grid                                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/-OnlLS06sPubx2f_prisWVv3MPc=/800x0/6d273f5f0bb5465da47d38351214b290/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/RIu68fAfxTPSFBhXh_L3osEhSHk=/332x332/smart/6d273f5f0bb5465da47d38351214b290/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/RIu68fAfxTPSFBhXh_L3osEhSHk=/332x332/smart/6d273f5f0bb5465da47d38351214b290/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/0gVBIHzigEbDGwAx0E9OghLDtF0=/800x0/c1c67ae4286c494eae7510049f7200bf/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/QtT_E69DmymyvCC8Lo8H2F6cdtY=/332x332/smart/c1c67ae4286c494eae7510049f7200bf/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/QtT_E69DmymyvCC8Lo8H2F6cdtY=/332x332/smart/c1c67ae4286c494eae7510049f7200bf/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/nSLvEBxA7I9wKgxtQSyWmHsdv4k=/800x0/0e33a33d79a447399fcac84880c47763/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/NZTfxQXUeXetAqKk8D5v3YmdGQw=/332x332/smart/0e33a33d79a447399fcac84880c47763/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/NZTfxQXUeXetAqKk8D5v3YmdGQw=/332x332/smart/0e33a33d79a447399fcac84880c47763/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Die<strong> Zwiebel </strong>abziehen und in kleine Würfel schneiden.</li>
	<li><strong>(Abweichend vom Rezept</strong> habe ich den <strong>Knoblauch </strong>fein gehackt.)</li>
	<li>Den <strong>Lachs</strong> waschen, ggf. entgräten, häuten und in 1cm große Würfel schneiden.</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69689">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 3</div>
        <div class="step-label">Nudeln kochen...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                                gallery-type-grid                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/svXiRTI-8hpJwGhNg8clQhnd0Rg=/800x0/1f395304c4444ccb8264106e7caf9533/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/OjzkgrKwgkMyI0C2C9Sz4xzpoPI=/332x332/smart/1f395304c4444ccb8264106e7caf9533/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/OjzkgrKwgkMyI0C2C9Sz4xzpoPI=/332x332/smart/1f395304c4444ccb8264106e7caf9533/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/l4paso5zFkm4zClCMz0GcvyRC_A=/800x0/0076f755d1d9423482d7fba8898af12d/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/TpzMIfTHJaiTUKZVMGZ6UOUAjQ8=/332x332/smart/0076f755d1d9423482d7fba8898af12d/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/TpzMIfTHJaiTUKZVMGZ6UOUAjQ8=/332x332/smart/0076f755d1d9423482d7fba8898af12d/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Die <strong>Nudeln</strong> in kochendem Salzwasser nach Packungsanweisung garen.</li>
	<li>In ein Sieb abgießen, abtropfen lassen und ggf. warm halten.</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69690">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 4</div>
        <div class="step-label">In der Pfanne anbraten...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                gallery-type-3-col-grid                                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/WMohvj8VnONx0P7F6pzUnFMEADA=/800x0/4323aba124734801b7834235d7f71288/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/4QoY_-xGi9CW1gbLeO84BVfellI=/332x332/smart/4323aba124734801b7834235d7f71288/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/4QoY_-xGi9CW1gbLeO84BVfellI=/332x332/smart/4323aba124734801b7834235d7f71288/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/At7eyUKHWGKGsJOhUrbwA6CZ4I0=/800x0/10f135a2a9ec48bab5c006d3ad5922d6/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/7h_j1-Tta_wTDFS9BYS812Ygj7o=/332x332/smart/10f135a2a9ec48bab5c006d3ad5922d6/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/7h_j1-Tta_wTDFS9BYS812Ygj7o=/332x332/smart/10f135a2a9ec48bab5c006d3ad5922d6/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/rdhqdD2VQENqC6j-VqSOH9ue9Ws=/800x0/8cf8f46e1cd04963b90abbb78109b027/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/8_LZF3sHtqeHQqZWff_NwUCuU1I=/332x332/smart/8cf8f46e1cd04963b90abbb78109b027/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/8_LZF3sHtqeHQqZWff_NwUCuU1I=/332x332/smart/8cf8f46e1cd04963b90abbb78109b027/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Etwas <strong>Olivenöl</strong> in einer Pfanne bei mittlerer Hitze glasig anschwitzen...</li>
	<li>(...den Knoblauch dazupressen und ca. 30 Sekunden mitgaren...)</li>
	<li>...mit <strong>Weißwein</strong> ablöschen, das <strong>Tomatenmark</strong> zufügen...</li>
	<li>...gut verrühren und etwa 5 Minuten schwach köcheln lassen. Bei Bedarf noch etwas Wasser zufügen.</li>
</ul><p><strong>Hinweis:</strong> Ich habe den Knoblauch fein gehackt.</p>

<p>(<strong>Abweichend vom Rezept</strong> habe ich den Weißwein durch Fleischbrühe ersetzt.)</p>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69691">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 5</div>
        <div class="step-label">Sahne zufügen...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                                gallery-type-grid                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/N8C0A6Nyx3il8L5hkZSfpSTbhY4=/800x0/48793b3044f4471e8f6ad57229a2c804/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/oOXQ1Z7ULgN5OobCb9mjw9cQuWA=/332x332/smart/48793b3044f4471e8f6ad57229a2c804/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/oOXQ1Z7ULgN5OobCb9mjw9cQuWA=/332x332/smart/48793b3044f4471e8f6ad57229a2c804/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/hro9s9UNNPfV4aHD0Hdbjqgq-UM=/800x0/ce2124a7bdea4d3a9ec72a5c77d6eed9/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/Xk0gRc7Tyzx_f3fWvJYlkFLdGDk=/332x332/smart/ce2124a7bdea4d3a9ec72a5c77d6eed9/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/Xk0gRc7Tyzx_f3fWvJYlkFLdGDk=/332x332/smart/ce2124a7bdea4d3a9ec72a5c77d6eed9/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Mit <strong>Sahne</strong> aufgießen...</li>
	<li>...und nochmal aufkochen lassen. Mit <strong>Salz</strong>, <strong>Pfeffer</strong>, <strong>Zucker</strong> und <strong>Zitronensaft</strong> abschmecken.</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69692">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 6</div>
        <div class="step-label">Lachs zufügen...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                gallery-type-3-col-grid                                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/HO-vbdMOhkiItngYRkKv8VNJiY0=/800x0/deb357a07b1848f39a98ab775d1fbf4d/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/SLyFCisbVgwvQfTjZe13_NmKcD0=/332x332/smart/deb357a07b1848f39a98ab775d1fbf4d/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/SLyFCisbVgwvQfTjZe13_NmKcD0=/332x332/smart/deb357a07b1848f39a98ab775d1fbf4d/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/8Dqc7mrlLnTeaGmZiCWf0q31wEo=/800x0/79bec9a314844d4087edcd7e531c501b/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/lq2oq2ioSCzw4pO6dEw-oS0MzTk=/332x332/smart/79bec9a314844d4087edcd7e531c501b/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/lq2oq2ioSCzw4pO6dEw-oS0MzTk=/332x332/smart/79bec9a314844d4087edcd7e531c501b/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/HFQHfcaIJt_9YbcLTEfSrwaz7aQ=/800x0/129e2da4f83440219601330a0edbadb4/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/_oLEfP_7zaltn9q7I2kRWF3zevQ=/332x332/smart/129e2da4f83440219601330a0edbadb4/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/_oLEfP_7zaltn9q7I2kRWF3zevQ=/332x332/smart/129e2da4f83440219601330a0edbadb4/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <p><strong>Hinweis:  Ab hier weiche ich etwas vom Rezept ab...</strong></p>

<ul><li>Die <strong>Lachswürfel</strong> in die Sauce geben, ...</li>
	<li>...alles gut vermischen, kurz aufkochen, Herd ausschalten, ...</li>
	<li>...die Pfanne mit dem Deckel schließen und Lachs in der Pfanne garziehen lassen.</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69693">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 7</div>
        <div class="step-label">Tomaten zufügen...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                                                gallery-type-grid                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/gSVp0tqcYNV6UdxIzd8PjFW_qso=/800x0/554a33b455ac46b6b83a9a1b7df778df/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/cPH4AR_XOOoLPygaNa8mLjJATUQ=/332x332/smart/554a33b455ac46b6b83a9a1b7df778df/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/cPH4AR_XOOoLPygaNa8mLjJATUQ=/332x332/smart/554a33b455ac46b6b83a9a1b7df778df/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/rGkq1Se-b7fBuq7tfXLgwscr_Ps=/800x0/2911aff1e78f4830a4fb4cc5e01d8921/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/v5GdbiBUpWCmj11MsvGK0K-h8pk=/332x332/smart/2911aff1e78f4830a4fb4cc5e01d8921/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/v5GdbiBUpWCmj11MsvGK0K-h8pk=/332x332/smart/2911aff1e78f4830a4fb4cc5e01d8921/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Die <strong>Tomaten </strong>waschen, klein würfeln, zur Sauce geben und darin erwärmen.</li>
	<li><strong>(Abweichend vom Rezept</strong> kamen bei uns zusätzlich noch ein paar Party-Garnelen (aus dem Kühlregal) mit dazu.)</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69694">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 8</div>
        <div class="step-label">Fertig...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                gallery-type-list
                    gallery-type-list-published                                                                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/bgAyIIUmH0gvqxK_SS3P-Pdrz4M=/800x0/69aad19fb6454b2aa2d2d6494f64554d/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/MFbDKORiKOy8gr-qEGYlfGfu37U=/674x0/69aad19fb6454b2aa2d2d6494f64554d/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/MFbDKORiKOy8gr-qEGYlfGfu37U=/674x0/69aad19fb6454b2aa2d2d6494f64554d/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <ul><li>Zum Schluss kam bei uns noch etwas gehackte Petersilie mit dazu.</li>
</ul>

                                <h4 class="article-element-step" id="articlestep69586">
        <div class="banderole-step m-r">Schritt 9</div>
        <div class="step-label">Servieren und genießen...</div>
    </h4>

                                <div class="article-image-gallery cf
                gallery-type-list
                    gallery-type-list-published                                                                ">

                    <div class="image-item">
                <a href="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/HSBdDgsbEkwuh9jnIMMiNwpzt94=/800x0/ff27fc4ed131423f8e1c6823a9bbb1dd/image.jpg" rel="article-gallery" target="_blank" class="colorbox-gallery">
                                            <img data-src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/3cXHGxgm5kngyBqb48KajOu98ng=/674x0/ff27fc4ed131423f8e1c6823a9bbb1dd/image.jpg" class="lazyload" alt=""/>
                        <noscript><img src="https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/community/3cXHGxgm5kngyBqb48KajOu98ng=/674x0/ff27fc4ed131423f8e1c6823a9bbb1dd/image.jpg" alt=""/></noscript>
                                    </a>
            </div>
            </div>

                            
    
    <p>Die Nudeln auf Tellern verteilen, zusammen mit der Sauce anrichten, servieren und genießen...</p>

<p><em><strong>Guten Appetit</strong></em>...</p>

<p><strong>Hinweis:</strong> Man kann die Nudeln auch gleich zur Sauce geben und vermischen.</p>

                    </div> 
    </div>

        </div>

                
        <script src="/community/bundles/fosjsrouting/js/router.js?version=35d0828e2ac5ab9bc1a871f4994576172e37fd23"></script>
        <script src="/community/js/routing?callback=fos.Router.setData"></script>


        <script type="text/javascript">
            $('#active-recipe-guide').on('recipeGuideSwitched', function() {
                if ($.colorbox && $.colorbox.settings) {
    $.colorbox.settings.trapFocus = false;

    /* Lightbox fuer Rezept-Anzeige */
    $('.colorbox-gallery').colorbox({
        close:     '<span>x</span>',
        maxHeight: '98%',
        maxWidth:  '98%',
        next:      '',
        opacity:   '0.8',
        photo:      true,
        previous:   '',
        rel:        'article-gallery',
        transition: 'none'
    });
}            });

            // Einmalig beim laden ausfuehren.
            $('#active-recipe-guide').trigger('recipeGuideSwitched');
        </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            $(function() {
                $('.recipe-guide-box > .tile-article-entry-image').click(function() {
                    var clickedElement = $(this).parent();
                    var url = clickedElement.data('recipe-guide-url');

                    // Spinner anzeigen
                    var spinner = clickedElement.find('.spinner-overlay');
                    spinner.show();

                    // appRouter verwenden, um die Route zu generieren.
                    $('#active-recipe-guide').load(url + ' .user-article-content', function() {

                        $(this).find('.section').hide();

                        $('.recipe-guide-box').each(function(){
                            $(this).removeClass('active');
                        });
                        clickedElement.addClass('active');

                        $('#active-recipe-guide').trigger('recipeGuideSwitched');

                        // spinner verstecken
                        spinner.hide();
                    });
                })
            });
        </script>

            </a></li>

                    <path d="M1.5 0l-1.5 1.5 2.5 2.5-2.5 2.5 1.5 1.5 4-4-4-4z" transform="translate(1)" />
                </svg>
            </a></li>
    </ul>                </div>            
                        <span id="banner-hpa-mr">

    	<div class="partnerlogo-50" data-tracking="{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;teaser&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;navigation_partnerlogo&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;WMF&quot;,&quot;reference&quot;:{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;magazine-category&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;WMF&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;125&quot;,&quot;campaign&quot;:{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;magazine-campaign&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;WMF Partner Integration&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;6555&quot;}}}">

            <noscript><img src="https://www.chefkoch.de/magazin/sites/default/files/media/image/2017-04/20170420_Partnerlogo-TeaserWMF.jpg" title="WMF" alt="WMF" border="0"></noscript>
		</a>
	</div>
    	<div class="partnerlogo-50" data-tracking="{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;teaser&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;navigation_partnerlogo&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;NAT\u00dcRLICH LECKER! - 100% nat\u00fcrliche Zutaten&quot;,&quot;reference&quot;:{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;magazine-category&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Knorr&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;93&quot;,&quot;campaign&quot;:{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;magazine-campaign&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Knorr Partner Integration&quot;,&quot;id&quot;:&quot;6557&quot;}}}">

            <noscript><img src="https://www.chefkoch.de/magazin/sites/default/files/media/image/2017-04/20170420_Partnerlogo-TeaserKnorr.jpg" title="NATÜRLICH LECKER! - 100% natürliche Zutaten" alt="NATÜRLICH LECKER! - 100% natürliche Zutaten" border="0"></noscript>
		</a>
	</div>
    </div>



        <div class="responsive-ad"><div id="AmobeeAd2">
        </div></div>

        <script type="text/javascript">

        /**
         * EMS has a need for specialized cookie functions and explicitly provided the following
         * code to us which knowingly duplicates similar implementations in functions.js.
         * We namespace the functions to safeguard against conflicts in global scope.
         *
         * @namespace CK.ems
         */
        (function() {

            "use strict";

            if (typeof window.CK === "undefined") {
                window.CK = {};
            }

            if (typeof window.CK.ems === "undefined") {
                window.CK.ems = {};
            }

            /**
            * Sets a cookie with a name, value and expiration date. The path is hardcoded to "/" so the cookie is valid
            * throughout the entire domain.
            *
            * @param cname Name of the cookie
            * @param cvalue Value of the cookie
            * @param exdays Time until cookie should expire in days
            */
            window.CK.ems.setCookie = function(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
                var d = new Date();
                var expires = "expires=";

                d.setTime(d.getTime()+(exdays*24*60*60*1000));
                expires += d.toUTCString();

                document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + "; path=/";
            };

            /**
            * Gets a cookie by name
            *
            * @param cname Name of the Cookie
            * @returns {String} Either the value of the cookie or ""
            */
            window.CK.ems.getCookie = function(cname) {
                var name = cname + "=";
                var ca = document.cookie.split(';');

                for (var i=0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                    var c = ca[i].trim();
                    if (c.indexOf(name) === 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
                }
                return "";
            };

            /**
            * EMS User Id handler
            *
            * This function returns a EMS User Id. It checks for an existing "ems_uid" cookie and retrieves its value or creates a new User Id
            * through CryptoJS.MD5 and stores it in the above-mentioned cookie.
            *
            * @requires CryptoJS (contained in asynchronously loaded /js/mobile/md5.js)
            * @returns {String} EMS User Id
            */
            window.CK.ems.handleEmsUId = function() {
                var ems_uid = window.CK.ems.getCookie("ems_uid");
                var ems_new_uid;

                if (ems_uid !== "") {
                    return ems_uid;
                } else {
                    ems_new_uid = CryptoJS.MD5(navigator.userAgent + "-" + (new Date()).getTime());
                    window.CK.ems.setCookie("ems_uid",ems_new_uid,30);
                    return ems_new_uid;
                }
            };

        })();

        // jQuery.getScript verwendet cache-busting, daher diese Hilfsfunktion
        // s. https://api.jquery.com/jquery.getscript/#caching-requests
        jQuery.cachedScript = function( url, options ) {
            options = $.extend( options || {}, {
                dataType: "script",
                cache: true,
                url: url
            });

            return jQuery.ajax( options );
        };

        // Die mobile Werbung soll abgerufen werden:
        // - auf nicht-responsiven Seiten, die $werbung[mobile][footer] nutzen (Mobile Seite!)
        // - auf responsiven Seiten, wenn die Seite in der mobilen Ansicht ist
        // Auf der normalen, nicht-responsiven Seite wird dieser Code garnicht eingebunden (kein $werbung[mobile])
        if (!CK.core.isLocationResponsive() || CK.core.hasSmallViewport()) {
            jQuery.when(
                jQuery.cachedScript('https://js.chefkoch-cdn.de/js/mobile/md5.js'),
                jQuery.cachedScript('https://img.chefkoch-cdn.de/gujAd.mobile.min.js'),
                jQuery.Deferred(function( deferred ){
                    $( deferred.resolve );
                })
            ).done(function ()
            {

                var userPageImpressions = 0;

                if ($.cookie('userPageImpressions') != null) {
                    userPageImpressions = parseInt($.cookie('userPageImpressions'));
                }

                $.cookie('userPageImpressions', userPageImpressions+1, { expires: (new Date()).getTime(), path: ' / '});
                    /*
                     * Interstitial erst ab der ersten PageImpression ausspielen
                     */
                    if (userPageImpressions == 0) {
                        GujAdMobile.GPT.suppressInterstitial();
                    }

                    if (typeof AmobeeAdHeader !== "undefined") {
                        AmobeeAdHeader();
                    }

                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAdListTop')) {
                        AmobeeAdListTop();
                    }
                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAd3')) {
                        AmobeeAd3();
                    }
                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAd4')) {
                        AmobeeAd4();
                    }
                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAd5')) {
                        AmobeeAd5();
                    }
                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAd6')) {
                        AmobeeAd6();
                    }

                    if (document.getElementById('AmobeeAd2')) {
                        getAmobeeAd(
                            document.getElementById('AmobeeAd2'),
                            '25898', // AdSpace ID (String)
                            '', // leer (String)
                            1, // Timeout in Sekunden (Integer)
                            0, // 1 fuer Test Requests (Integer)
                            '', // Ziel-URL (String) - leer fuer mobile Banner,
                            'tp=4&prt=G+J&kw=Pasta,Salzwasser,Lachsfilets,Sahne,Weißwein,Zwiebeln,Knoblauchzehen,Tomatenmark,Salz und Pfeffer,Zucker,Zitronensaft,Tomaten,Wasser,Fisch,gekocht,Gemüse,Hauptspeise,Nudeln,2873431439629839,simpel;kw=rezepte;kw=rezepte&uid=' + window.CK.ems.handleEmsUId() // Targeting-Werte als HTML Parameter (String),
                        );
                    }
                    
                    });
        }

        </script>

<script>
    window.ck = window.ck || {};
    window.ck.recipe2shoppinglist = window.ck.recipe2shoppinglist || {};

    // given data from recipe-page
    window.ck.recipe2shoppinglist.givenRecipeData = {};
    window.ck.recipe2shoppinglist.givenRecipeData.recipeId = 2873431439629839;
    window.ck.recipe2shoppinglist.givenRecipeData.servings = 4;
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/ms_shoppinglist/build/recipe2shoppinglist.min.js" async></script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://shop.rewe.de/ingredients/button.js"></script>

<script>

    (function() {
        $.fn.isInViewport = function () {
            var elementTop = $(this).offset().top;
            var elementBottom = elementTop + $(this).outerHeight();
            var viewportTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
            var windowHeight = window.innerHeight
                || document.documentElement.clientHeight
                || document.body.clientHeight;
            var viewportBottom = viewportTop + windowHeight;

            return (elementTop < viewportBottom && elementTop > viewportTop) || (elementBottom < viewportBottom && elementBottom > viewportTop);
        };

        var $window = $(window);
        var $orderOnlineButtons = $(".order-online__buttons");
        var handleDeliveryServiceTracking = function() {
            if ($orderOnlineButtons.isInViewport()) {
                if (ck && ck.tracking) {
                    var reweTeaser = {
                        type: "teaser",
                        position: "delivery-service-rds",
                        offset: 1,
                        reference: {"type": "tracking-id", "id": "REWE", "title": "REWE"}
                    };

                    var whiskTeaser = {
                        type: "teaser",
                        position: "delivery-service-rds",
                        offset: 2,
                        reference: {"type": "tracking-id", "id": "Whisk", "title": "Whisk"}
                    };

                    var reweLayer = {
                        type: "teaser",
                        position: "delivery-service-rds-layer",
                        offset: 1,
                        reference: {"type": "tracking-id", "id": "REWE", "title": "REWE"}
                    };

                    // track teaser impression
                    ck.tracking.trackTeaser(reweTeaser);
                    ck.tracking.trackTeaser(whiskTeaser);

                    // register teaser click handler
                    $(".order-online__buttons").on("click", "a.rewe-delivery-button", function() {
                        ck.tracking.trackEvent({
                            type: 'event',
                            name: 'click',
                            target: reweTeaser
                        });

                        // layer click handler
                        $("#rewe-button-overlay-submit").on("click", function() {
                            ck.tracking.trackEvent({
                                type: 'event',
                                name: 'click',
                                target: reweLayer
                            });
                        });
                    });

                    $(".order-online__buttons").on("click", ".QRJG-XYRM-SHHO-YBDX", function() {
                        ck.tracking.trackEvent({
                            type: 'event',
                            name: 'click',
                            target: whiskTeaser
                        });
                    });
                }

                // teaser impression is tracked - unregister scroll event
                $window.off("scroll.orderOnline");
            }
        }

        // register scroll event to track teaser as soon as it is in viewport
        $window.on("scroll.orderOnline", handleDeliveryServiceTracking);
        handleDeliveryServiceTracking();
    })();
</script>


<script>
    (function () {
        window.CK.core.loadScriptsOnLargeViewport([
            'https://js.chefkoch-cdn.de/js/default/v972ba6265d59a245f14e0991adc78f7e.ck.recipe.how2videoLoader.js',
            'https://js.chefkoch-cdn.de/js/modules/colorbox/vf05eb8f7b4d07e4a89a6e81b22577d57.jquery.colorbox-min.js',
            'https://js.chefkoch-cdn.de/js/dist/v30fd41a64fadcba2fc024c0653617f3f.recipe-desktop-bundle.min.js'
        ], true);
    })();
</script>

<script>
    (new window.CK.core.ScriptLoader()).require(
        ['https://js.chefkoch-cdn.de/js/dist/vaea743765e34f2537c563d6eab65b533.recent-recipes.min.js'],
        function() {
            var currentRecipe = {
                id: 2873431439629839,
                title: "Pasta mit Lachs-Sahnesauce",
                description: "",
                previewImageUrl: "https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/rezepte/287/287343/1024311-224x148-fix-pasta-mit-lachs-sahnesauce.jpg",
                rating: 4.6,
                ratingCount: 51,
                difficulty: "simpel",
                preptime: 30,
                url: "/rezepte/2873431439629839/Pasta-mit-Lachs-Sahnesauce.html"
            };
            window.CK.recentRecipes.storage.store(currentRecipe);
        }
    );
</script>

    <script src="https://static.chefkoch-cdn.de/ck.de/281e47352b55e52c6d262acf8611a957.min.js"></script>

                        
            <script type="text/javascript">

        (function(win, doc){
            var forceGujAd = feature('FEATURE_FLAG_FORCE_GUJAD');

            var initAdPosition = function (elem) {
                var parentNode = elem.parentNode;
                var hasNoAutoInitParent = false;
                var hasResponsiveAdParent = false;
                var isMew = CK.core.hasSmallViewport() && CK.core.isLocationResponsive();

                if (parentNode) {
                    hasNoAutoInitParent = parentNode.classList.contains('ad-no-auto-init');
                    hasResponsiveAdParent = parentNode.classList.contains('responsive-ad');

                    if (hasNoAutoInitParent) {
                        return;
                    }

                    if (isMew && !hasResponsiveAdParent) {
                        return;
                    }

                    if (!isMew && hasResponsiveAdParent) {
                        return;
                    }
                }

                console.log('Load Ad-Block: ' + elem.id);

                GujAd.cmd.push(function () {
                    GujAd.push(elem.id);
                });
            };
            var initAds = function (container) {
                var collection = container.getElementsByClassName('gujAd');

                if (typeof GujAd === "undefined" || !forceGujAd) {
                    return false;
                }

                for (var i = 0; i < collection.length; i++) {
                    initAdPosition(collection[i]);
                }


                GujAd.cmd.push(function () {
                    GujAd.finalizeInlineLoading();
                });
            };

            initAds(doc);
        }(window, document));

        /**
         * Load G+J Ad Manager for desktop ads asynchronously, unless location is responsive and viewed on a small screen
         *
         * @requires global-head.min.js
         */
        if (forceGujAd || !(CK.core.hasSmallViewport() && CK.core.isLocationResponsive())) {
            var gujAdLoader = new CK.core.ScriptLoader();

            gujAdLoader.require([gujadLinkJS], false);
        }
    </script>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://script.ioam.de/iam.js"></script>

        

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var iam_data = {
            "st":"chefkoch", // site/domain
            "cp":"rezept_anzeige", // code
            "sv":"in" // Fragebogen
        };

        if(CK.core.hasSmallViewport() && CK.core.isLocationResponsive()) {
            iam_data['st'] = 'mobchefk';
            iam_data['cp'] = 'ckmobile_' + iam_data['cp'];

                                            iam_data['sv'] = 'mo';
                    }

        iom.c(iam_data, 1);
    </script>
    <!--/SZM -->

<script type="text/javascript">
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

    var googletag = googletag || {};
    googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

    googletag.cmd.push(function () {
        googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function (event) {
            window.dataLayer.push({
                'event':'googletag.events.SlotRenderEndedEvent',
                'googletag.events.SlotRenderEndedEvent':event
            });
        });
        googletag.enableServices();
    });
</script>
